name: Jaybird Tarah Pro - Earphones with mic - in-ear - Bluetooth - wireless - noise isolating - black, flash | Dell USA
description: Extremely durable, fully weatherproof and fast-charging wireless headphones inspired by the extreme demands of endurance adventures and high-mileage races, the Tarah Pro features an industry-leading, 14-hour battery life to keep the music flowing through any epic day out. The Tarah Pro also features SnapLock magnetic buds that secure around your neck and automatically turn off the music to conserve battery when not in use.
